welcome_message_body:
Welcome to Mexico! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning beaches that this beautiful country is known for. Explore, relax, and immerse yourself in the charm of Mexico.

Welcome to the Philippines! Get ready to discover the breathtaking landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality that this enchanting country is known for. Enjoy every moment as you explore and experience all that the Philippines has to offer.
